message.content:
cs.CY, cs.HC, cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.CR

This paper proposes a method for continuous authentication using arm movement patterns captured by a smartwatch's sensors. The paper focuses on the design and implementation of the authentication mechanisms and evaluates their performance under different environments. Based on this, the most likely sub-category is cs.CY (Computer Science and Game Theory) as the paper deals with designing and evaluating authentication mechanisms. Other likely sub-categories include cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) as the paper involves capturing and analyzing human movement patterns, cs.LG (Machine Learning) as the paper uses classifiers to authenticate users, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) as the paper deals with analyzing patterns in sensor data, and cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) as the paper involves continuous authentication for security purposes.
